description: This file contains utility functions for accessing and searching recipe data, categories, and ingredients within a React Native project. It exports functions to retrieve data by ID, name, and other criteria, and references external data arrays.

methods.name: getCategoryById
methods.description: Retrieves a category object matching the given category ID.

methods.name: getIngredientName
methods.description: Returns the name of an ingredient given its ID.

methods.name: getIngredientUrl
methods.description: Returns the photo URL of an ingredient given its ID.

methods.name: getCategoryName
methods.description: Returns the name of a category given its ID.

methods.name: getRecipes
methods.description: Returns an array of recipes belonging to a specific category.

methods.name: getRecipesByIngredient
methods.description: Returns recipes that include a specific ingredient ID.

methods.name: getNumberOfRecipes
methods.description: Counts the number of recipes in a specific category.

methods.name: getAllIngredients
methods.description: Returns an array pairing ingredients with additional data based on an ID array.

methods.name: getRecipesByIngredientName
methods.description: Searches for recipes containing an ingredient with a given name.

methods.name: getRecipesByCategoryName
methods.description: Searches for recipes within categories matching a given name.

methods.name: getRecipesByRecipeName
methods.description: Searches for recipes with titles matching a given name.
